item.description: My name is Anderson. I am an Edison Engineer at GE Healthcare, a student, a scientist, and a maker. I am an alumni of William & Mary, ‘20. All opinions expressed both here and on my various presences across the webs are (or were at one point) my own. I have had internet access since age 10, so I disavow anything said more than 3 years ago as a rule. My beliefs do not represent those of my employers.
